metadata.shortInfo: This track shows SNPs from the The Million Mutation Project (Waterston/Moerman). Color signifies the severity of impact predicted by Ensembl's Variant Effect Predictor. 'HIGH' impacts are red, 'MEDIUM' are yellow, 'LOW' are cyan (light blue), and 'MODIFIER' are purple. This is the same color scheme as is used at the Alliance of Genome Resources.

style.label: function(f) {var name = f.get('public_name'); var other_name = f.get('other_name'); if (typeof other_name === 'undefined') {return name;} return name+'-'+other_name; }
